name: Spirit Gorgons. River Sentinel
description: A mystical female silhouette in a black mantle stands on the quiet riverbank, arms spread wide like wings. Her still pose evokes the presence of an ancient statue, while a gentle wind stirs the fabric, giving the figure a subtle sense of motion. The water mirrors her form, creating the aura of a dual world — both material and mythical. This NFT is part of the “Spirit Gorgona / Rebirth of the Gorgon” series, exploring myth, movement, and the power of the feminine archetype.
